body: +1 on this. I think we had every intention of moving this, but namespace didn't exist when it was originallly created.

Ah, that docstring is templated, so I didn't see it earlier.

Gotta fixup the template a bit, one sec.
Fixed all the interval doctests aside from IntervalIndex.get_loc https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/24931
